overview: Have you ever done something dishonest to upset your girl? Well, we hope you haven't, because cheating is something a woman can do a lot better than you. Take Barbi and Kelly for example, when they found out that their men were turning from card sharps into wolves, they set them up and took away all of their dishonest earnings. This is a fun-filled sexual comedy that delivers the goods for both men and women. It's an erotic view on a favorite pastime among couples - cheating! Nina Hartley (Barbi) and Jeanna Fine (Kelly) let us know that you cannot get away with it and Ron Jeremy (Dover) with Tom Byron (Hawkins) always find a reason to try - cheating!
tagline: Cheating Is A Dirty Business... But Somebody's Got To Do It!
title: Cheating!
